SQL.LOAD: SELECT user_id, company_id, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, user_company_assigned_id, authorization_limit, payment_limit, liability_override_limit FROM elp_user_company_assigned WHERE user_company_assigned_id = :user_company_assigned_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_USERID_COMPANYID: SELECT user_id, company_id, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, user_company_assigned_id, authorization_limit, payment_limit, liability_override_limit FROM elp_user_company_assigned WHERE user_id = :user_id and company_id = :company_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_user_company_assigned SET user_id = :user_id, company_id = :company_id, modified_by = :modified_by, authorization_limit = :authorization_limit, payment_limit = :payment_limit, liability_override_limit = :liability_override_limit WHERE user_company_assigned_id = :user_company_assigned_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_user_company_assigned ( user_id, company_id, created_by, user_company_assigned_id, authorization_limit, payment_limit, liability_override_limit ) VALUES ( :user_id, :company_id, :created_by, :user_company_assigned_id, :authorization_limit, :payment_limit, :liability_override_limit )
